settings.subtitle: Woodchip & Magnolia
settings.title: Nidra Flow
settings.text: Add some energy and movement to your space with our beautiful collection of nature inspired wallpapers and murals. Go with the flow with our marbled effect ink design, or bring the outside with our Nidra collection of trees and leaves and calming rivers....

settings.subtitle: WOODCHIP & MAGNOLIA
settings.title: Out Of The Woods
settings.text: Our woodland-inspired designs are a delight for all the senses; inspiring a feeling of walking across crisp, crunchy leaves on a bright autumnal morning, and denoting the sights, sounds and smells of the forest

settings.subtitle: WOODCHIP & MAGNOLIA
settings.title: Blooming Lovely
settings.text: From heavy petals to full blooms, our Blooming Lovely collection is for the flower power lovers with a penchant for pretty things

settings.subtitle: Woodchip & Magnolia
settings.title: English Garden
settings.text: Inspired by the classic English garden, this botanical collection of floral fancies is enough to inspire a whole world of bold and beautiful decor.

settings.subtitle: Woodchip & Magnolia
settings.title: From The Orient
settings.text: Designed with the chinoiserie and oriental interior style in mind, stunning trees and leaves are combined with vivid colours and traditional prints to create pattern and colour combinations to complement any space.

settings.subtitle: Woodchip & Magnolia
settings.title: The Wisteria Edit
settings.text: The enchanting nature of the long, trailing scented blooms of Wisteria was the inspiration behind this stunning collection of wallpapers, murals and fabrics.....

settings.subtitle: WOODCHIP & MAGNOLIA
settings.title: The Petrichor Collection
settings.text: Inspired by the landscapes of the Lancashire moors and the transition of the seasons, this new collection explores the beauty of traditional heritage with a modern twist....

settings.subtitle: Woodchip & Magnolia
settings.title: The Lush Collection
settings.text: Keep palm and carry on with our collection of lush tropical wallpapers, fabrics and paint colours. Bring the fun-factor to your space with our bold and beautiful palm prints and pineapples, or go bird watching with our Wonderland mural featuring a pair of fabulous flamingoes.

settings.subtitle: Fearne Cotton
settings.title: Hope & Bloom
settings.text: An exclusive designer collection in collaboration with presenter and author Fearne Cotton. Consisting of five unique and personal wallpaper and fabric designs, this collection embodies Fearne’s light and quirky style, using a blend of fresh colours and calming patterns

settings.subtitle: Woodchip & Magnolia
settings.title: Fake It
settings.text: Fake it ’til you make it so they say, and we’d have to agree. Why spend time and money on the real thing when we’ve got the faux real solution at the click of your fingers.

settings.subtitle: Woodchip & Magnolia
settings.title: Wonderland
settings.text: If unique designs and classics with a twist are your thing, then you’ve come to the right place with our collection of off-the-wall wallpapers and fabrics. We’ll take you all the way to Wonderland with our quirky selection of wallpapers to make you second guess yourself. Including flamingoes in heels (yes, you read that right).......

settings.subtitle: Woodchip & Magnolia
settings.title: Granny Chic
settings.text: Fill your home with pattern, texture and moments of nostalgia with our collection of Granny Chic wallpapers, fabrics and paint colours. Whether you’re a grandmillenial or just a fan of florals, you’ll find what you’re looking for amongst our gorgeous blooms and delicate bird prints.

settings.subtitle: Woodchip & Magnolia
settings.title: Wild Things
settings.text: Take a walk on the wild side with our fun and feisty collection of animal print wallpapers and fabrics. From tropical bird styles to rock ’n’ roll leopard prints, we’ve got the Animal Kingdom covered from your ceilings to your floor.

settings.subtitle: Woodchip & Magnolia
settings.title: Nostalgia
settings.text: Take the faded glamour of the past and bring it into the present with our nostalgic collection of wallpapers, fabrics and paint colours. From the decorative vintage Victorian times to the grandiose Art Deco days of the 1920s, we’ve got a time machine that will take you to any era you want.

settings.subtitle: Woodchip & Magnolia
settings.title: Land Of Milk & Money
settings.text: Transport yourself to another world with our Land of Milk and Honey collection of stunning wallpapers and fabrics. From ethereal forest-scapes to butterflies in the sky, this collection is for the schemers and day dream believers.

settings.title: For the VIP's
settings.subheading: Calling all designers, decorators, developers, architects and stylists; we're here to make your dream schemes a reality (and as hassle-free as possible!)

settings.title: High Quality Products

settings.title: Bold & Beautiful Designs
settings.subheading: We want to encourage individuality and celebrate uniqueness with our bold and beautiful designs. We don't do trends; instead we believe homes should be designed around their unique quirks, as well as your clients own unique style (which is where our bespoke service comes in!)
